remarks.format: ## Remarks Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type. In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
